task.title: Upgrade the Management Console
task.shortdesc: This topic describes how to upgrade the Management Console.

ul.li: If you are upgrading when deploying the Management Console behind a load balancer (ELB), see .
The following instructions assume you have already successfully configured the Eucalyptus Management Console for Nginx in a previous version of Eucalyptus.
